ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $RecordType.Name = 'Technical Issue' && (ISBLANK(TEXT(Sub_Class__c))) && IsClosed = false && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ (US)' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' && $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User' && $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE' && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm' && $User.Id !='005300000041m9d'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter sub class values to fill Supported Products
